{{doomwiki}}The '''{{wp|Head-up_display|head-up display}}''' or '''status bar''' is the interface showing important information to the [[player]], such as [[health]], [[armor]], owned [[artifact]]s, [[weapon]]s and [[key]]s, the [[mugshot]] and so on.
Most of the HUD is disabled when the {{c|{{CVAR|R|screenblocks}}}} [[console variable]] is set to 12. [[ZDoom]] also offers a default fullscreen HUD, an [[alternate HUD]], and the status bar from the original games. The [[SBARINFO]] lump can be used to define other HUDs.
The HUD also handles [[message]]s, [[crosshair]]s and the currently equipped [[weapon]]. On Windows systems, if {{wp|DirectX}} is available, the HUD is displayed in 32-bit colors even though the game world remains in 8-bit paletted mode. (If using an [[OpenGL]] [[source port]], the entire game is in 32-bit color, including both the HUD and the game world.)
The HUD can be configured through the [[HUD options]] menu. [[Category:Glossary]]
